name: 1000 Ducks
description:
RUN THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN.

In 1000 Ducks you must organize and manage an ever growing army of ducks to sell lemonade, buy upgrades, and defeat the one true Duck God™.

Controls: Use the Mouse to Drag and Drop Ducks around to the various resource locations

Tips:

Sacrificing Ducks can also be a way to control the population and require less food and water.

Programming by Austin Leach, Kristian Aggabao, Nikalas Culvey, Maxwell Schwartz

Art by Maxwell Schwartz

Music by Kristian Aggabao
